nlp.token
Class Tokenizer

java.lang.Object
  nlp.token.Tokenizer

public class Tokenizer
extends java.lang.Object

Tokenize an input stream. This is taken from ATMan. 

 Typical use:
 Tokenizer t = new Tokenizer(reader);
 Token tok;
 while((tok = t.getNext()) != null)
 {
 }

Constructor Detail

Tokenizer

public Tokenizer(java.io.Reader r)
Makes a tokenizer that reads from the given reader

Parameters:
r - Where to read from

Tokenizer

public Tokenizer(java.io.Reader r,
                 boolean getPOS)
Makes a tokenizer that reads from the given reader

Parameters:
r - Where to read from
getPOS - Whether the tokenizer should read in parts-of-speech for each token, separated by a slash, as in:
the/DT0 books/NN2 are/VBZ on/PRP the/DT0 table/NN1 ./PUN

Testing program. Tokenizes "test.txt" to stdout.

argv - Ignored
